plot: Will a bedraggled butcher boy sing and dance his way into the heart of an adorable animal lover? Bye Bye Burger, a musical set in the 1950s, is a glistening red cinematic sirloin steak, with whipped cream and a cherry on top.
title: Bye Bye Burger!
plot_es: Will a bedraggled butcher boy sing and dance his way into the heart of an adorable animal lover? Bye Bye Burger, a musical set in the 1950s, is a glistening red cinematic sirloin steak, with whipped cream and a cherry on top.
